summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley discussing individuals in Paris over a weekend. The email contains a confidentiality notice and indicates that the information may be attorney-client privileged.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing plans involving others in Paris.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email, which discusses individuals in Paris.

keyFacts: The email was sent by Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley.
The email discusses individuals in Paris over a weekend.
The communication is marked as confidential and may be attorney-client privileged.
